Html:
I got the following compiling error when I uprgade to VS2010. Any idea?

c:\Dev\Kigg3.0\Source\Web\Views\Membership\Detail.aspx(21): error CS0433: The type 'System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary' exists in both 'c:\Program Files (x86)\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\.NETFramework\v4.0\System.Web.dll' and 'c:\Windows\assembly\GAC_MSIL\System.Web.Routing\3.5.0.0__31bf3856ad364e35\System.Web.Routing.dll'

Found the answer myself. Need to add

The following line to the kigg.web project.

 

   <AspNetCompiler VirtualPath="temp" PhysicalPath="$(ProjectDir)\..\Web" ToolPath="C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727" />
